item.title: Submit Trailers For The Official ModDB YouTube!
item.description: Read up on how to submit your game or mod trailer to the ModDB YouTube.

item.title: Auto Article Authorisation Now Live for IndieDB and ModDB!
item.description: As of the 19th July 2021, ModDB and IndieDB have received a new system for article authorisation that allows you to ship updates for your projects more reliably than ever before! Read on to learn how the system works, why we implemented it, and what you should keep in mind to make sure your articles are of great quality before being sent through the system.

item.title: Steam Deck Platform Announced, Supports Mods
item.description: The Steam Deck is the newest tech release by Valve - read on to learn about this portable PC.

item.title: SCP: Pandemic Releases Kickstarter Trailer
item.description: A new trailer is out for the SCP squad-based game, SCP: Pandemic.

item.title: DBolical Discord Revamp
item.description: Changes have come to the DBolical Discord with new channels, roles, and more!

item.title: Introducing ModDB And IndieDB’s New Editor
item.description: Greetings from the newest DBolical team member, Kralich/David, who will be managing the editorial and community management side of ModDB and IndieDB.
